name: Companion-blog
tagline: This is a blog for stuff
body:
### Hello and bienvenue to elic me.
This website aims to enrich everyones lives with our thoughts on current events, different ideologies, and sports. While some may not agree with us, we aim to basically put our minds on the web for everyone to see. The people behind this website are:

```
Sarin Dutt (sexy, debonair)
George Kernochan (really fat)
Marco Congello (ugly)
```
George is the fat one!

### Why?
Because we are bored. Not really! We are all college sophomores at Manhattan College and this school is so easy that we need something else to do.

### Rather Drive Stick?
Marco can teach you. He is an accomplished stick driver along with George Kernochan. These gentlemen know their way around a car and other things too..ladies. But in all seriousness this is one of the many topics of areas that we will cover on this website. 

###Stuff we may touch uopn:
Here we give a list of topics and general areas that we will talk about:

```
Sports :
-Soccer
-Baseball
-Basketball
-Golf
-Tennis
-Cricket
-Football
-Hockey
-Frisbee (not a sport)

Travel:
-places we found delighted
-recommended places to travel 

Various fun activities:
-mainly take place in NYC

And More...
```

### Authors and Contributors
You can find us outside and not on the internet, mainly because we dont know how to turn on a computer. 

### Support or Contact
Like what we do, thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
